S-VHPS15: Thyroid Hormone Receptor Activation Assay: Measurement of transcriptional response to T3 in neuronal cell cultures
Thyroid Hormone Receptor Activation Assay: Measurement of transcriptional response to T3 in neuronal cell cultures
Part of the development of an in vitro testing battery aimed at evaluating thyroid hormone (TH)-mediated developmental neurotoxicity.
Centre for Health Protection, National Institute for Public Health and the Environment (RIVM), Bilthoven, the Netherlands
